title: React for Beginners
description: Learn the fundamentals of React, including components, props, and state.
details: This course covers JSX, functional components, hooks, and building small projects to solidify your knowledge.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into JavaScript concepts like closures, prototypes, and async programming.
details: We'll explore advanced ES6+ features, write reusable modules, and practice with complex real-world problems.

title: Fullstack Web Development
description: Build complete web apps using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and React.
details: You'll create a production-ready MERN application, handle authentication, deploy to the cloud, and more.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Learn the principles of effective user interface and experience design.
details: Understand color theory, typography, wireframing, and how to create prototypes with Figma.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms
description: Master essential algorithms and data structures to ace coding interviews.
details: Covers linked lists, trees, graphs, sorting, searching, and problem-solving strategies.
